facet_1.name: Thunderstorm
facet_1.effects: Thunder Strike also hits all enemies within a fully formed Kinetic Field. Kinetic Field is Disruptor's third ability with the selected facet.

facet_2.name: Kinetic Fence
facet_2.effects: Kinetic Fence is Disruptor's third ability with the selected facet. After a short formation time, creates a wall-barrier of kinetic energy that slows enemy units down to the point where they cannot pass through it.

facet_3.name: Transferrence
facet_3.effects: Adds an active component to Electromagnetic Repulsion ability with allied unit-targeting functionality.

effects: Mutes all affected enemy units' items for its duration
Adds ground-targeting functionality, Thunder Strike lies dormant for short duration and attaches itself to first enemy unit that comes within the radius
Increases cast range, the number of strikes, and the total duration

level_20: +2s Kinetic Field Duration / +1 Kinetic Fence Charge
level_15: +1.5s Static Storm Duration / +6 Static Storm Damage Instances
+10% Glimpse Distance to Damage / +300 Glimpse Max Damage

abilities.name: Electromagnetic Repulsion
abilities.description: Repulses and knocks all enemy units back within the radius, whenever the Stormcrafter accumulates a certain amount of damage taken.
abilities.details: Safe harbor found inside the storm.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: The Stormcrafter's hero model has hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Thunder Strike
ability_1.details: Repeatedly strikes the unit with lightning. Exposes the affected enemy target, with each strike damaging nearby enemy units in a small radius, slowing both their movement and attack speeds for its duration.
ability_1.description: Repeatedly strikes the unit with lightning. Exposes the affected enemy target, with each strike damaging nearby enemy units in a small radius, slowing both their movement and attack speeds for its duration.

facet_effects.thunderstorm: Also hits all enemies within a fully formed Kinetic Field and increases slow duration

interaction_notes: The unit-targeted damage and its radius damage component is independent of each other
Exposes the affected enemy unit, but does not grant True Sight over it
Grants a 3.34-second 450-radius flying vision at the affected enemy unit's last location

ability_2.name: Glimpse
ability_2.details: Teleports the target hero back to where it was a few seconds ago. Deals damage to the affected enemy hero corresponding to its teleported distance as soon as it appears at the marked location.
ability_2.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was a few seconds ago.
technical_details: Distance to Damage Bonus Factor: 0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35 (0.3/0.35/0.4/0.45 with talent)
interaction_notes: Creates the Glimpse projectile from the affected unit's current position
Applies Silence and issues a stop command
The teleportation instantly disintegrates regular illusions

ability_3.name: Kinetic Field
ability_3.details: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that manipulates affected enemy's movement speed to point where they cannot pass.
ability_3.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that manipulates affected enemy's movement speed to point where they cannot pass.

facet_effects.thunderstorm: Thunder Strike also hits all enemies within a fully formed Kinetic Field

interaction_notes: 1 second after cast, creates a 420-radius negative aura
Sets the affected units' movement speed accordingly to their proximity to the visible field barrier
Has to be facing the visible barrier and within the SetMS zones

ability_4.name: Kinetic Fence
ability_4.details: After a short formation time, creates a wall-barrier of kinetic energy that slows enemy units down to the point where they cannot pass through it.
ability_4.description: After a short formation time, creates a wall-barrier of kinetic energy that slows enemy units down to the point where they cannot pass through it.
interaction_notes: Grants all charges immediately upon learning the ability

ability_5.name: Static Storm
ability_5.details: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but gradually increases in power over the duration.
ability_5.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but gradually increases in power over the duration.
technical_details: Mute Duration: 6 (7.5 with talent and Scepter)
interaction_notes: Both the silence and mute are provided by an aura
The damage value per instance is an arithmetic progression over the entire duration

changes: Thunder Strike: Reduced slow duration from 0.4 to 0.3
Reduced Thunderstorm slow duration bonus from 0.4 to 0.3
ADDED the Transferrence facet to Electromagnetic Repulsion
Adds an active component to the ability with allied unit-targeting functionality
Thunder Strike Thunderstorm now also increases slow duration by 0.4
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Reduced Thunder Strike dormant duration from 5 to 4
Talents: LVL 15 +1.5s Static Storm duration → +60 Static Storm max damage per second
LVL 20 +0.6s Thunder Strike slow duration → +150 Electromagnetic Repulsion effect radius/knockback distance
LVL 20 +2s Kinetic Field duration/+1 Kinetic Fence charge reduced to +1.5s Kinetic Field duration/+1 Kinetic Fence charge
Thunder Strike: Increased strike radius from 240 to 260
Thunderstorm now strikes all enemy units within the Kinetic Field even when the unit-targeted enemy is outside of the field radius
Kinetic Fence: Reduced charge restore time from 20/18/16/14 to 20/17/13/11
Talents: LVL 10 +10 Thunder Strike damage per strike increased to +15
